title: [Romance] All I Want for Christmas Is a Duke - Valerie Bowman
description:
All I Want for Christmas Is a Duke
by Valerie Bowman, Vivienne Lorret,
Tiffany Clare and Ashlyn Macnamara


The holidays are a time for dining, dancing, and of courseâ€”dukes! Celebrate the Christmas season with this enchanting collection of historical romances featuring the most eligible bachelors of the tonâ€¦

A childish prank may have reunited the Duke of Hollingsworth with his estranged wife, but only the magic of Christmas will show this couple â€™tis the season of second chancesâ€¦

Sophie Kinsley planned to remain a wallflower at the Duke of Hollyshireâ€™s ball. Yet when a dance with him leads to a stolen kiss, will the duke be willing to let her go? Or will Sophieâ€™s Christmas wish be granted at last?

To the Duke of Vale, science solves everythingâ€”even marriage. When the impulsive Ivy Sutherland makes him question all of his data, he realizes that heâ€™s overlooked a vital component in his search for the perfect match: love.

Patience Markham never forgot the fateful dance she had with the future Duke of Kingsbury. But when a twist of fate brings them together for Christmas Eve, will the stars finally align in their favor?

An Avon Romance
